Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
Summary: Several taped sightings of 2 UFO's while visiting my dad.This happened over a period of 1 week in Mcdonough Georgia.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy dad and his wife were telling me about ufo's at there house for many months.I of course thought they were crazy and making it up until my fathers wife asked me if I wanted to see the ufo outside.I immediately laughed and said sure.I grabbed my Lumix digital camera that has video and recorded the event.I zoomed on the bright light which appears to be like a bright star or the north star.Once I zoomed in on full, I could see the actual shape which was a perfect circle.It was greyish in color with many blurry black dots at the bottom.As I was recorded the bottom of the aircraft it zoomed much higher in the sky fast.Real fast.It zoomed up and down and I guess it realized that I was taping it and moved very high in the sky, so the only thing that would appear on my screen was a bright light.It kept going up and down but would move at light speed much faster than I could possibly zoom.Now I was completely shocked at this event.She then showed me another one that was pretty much right above the house so I zoomed in out it as well.It was the same shape,with the same black blurry dots on the bottom and it zoomed closer and then further away just like the other one and this one was just as fast....Every night these 2 ufo's are outside of my dads house and I have about 8 videos of them doing the same thing.Some with the tripod and others with me holding the camera as still as possible.I AM COMPLETELY FREAKED OUT RIGHT NOW.They are out there every damn night so I taped them every night long as the sky is clear.I never believed in ufo's before but at this moment, there is not logically explanation to what I saw and taped night after night.Right now it is 12:41 am and I am going back outside to tape another video because I am leaving in the morning to drive back to New Jersey.UFO'S ARE VERY REAL!!!! I HAVE MANY,MANY VIDEOS TO PROVE THIS PLUS THEY COME HERE EVERY NIGHT!!!! Signed-BELIEVER
